verses.verse: Now these are <S%H5315><s%> the names of <S%H3318><s%> the sons <S%H3290><s%> of <S%H3409><s%> Israel, <S%H7657><s%> who came <S%H5315><s%> into Egypt <S%H3130><s%> (every man and <S%H4714><s%> his household <S%H1004><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with Jacob <S%H3290><s%>):
Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Simeon, <S%H8095><s%> Levi, <S%H3878><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%>
Issachar, <S%H3485><s%> Zebulun, <S%H2074><s%> and Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%>
Dan <S%H1835><s%> and Naphtali, <S%H5321><s%> Gad <S%H1410><s%> and Asher. <S%H836><s%>

All the souls <S%H5315><s%> who came out <S%H3318><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>'s body <S%H3409><s%> were seventy <S%H7657><s%> souls, <S%H5315><s%> and Joseph <S%H3130><s%> was in Egypt already. <S%H4714><s%>
Joseph <S%H3130><s%> died, <S%H4191><s%> as did all his brothers, <S%H251><s%> and all that generation. <S%H1755><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were fruitful, <S%H6509><s%> and increased abundantly, <S%H8317><s%> and multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and grew exceedingly <S%H3966><s%> mighty; <S%H6105><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> was filled with them. <S%H4390><s%>
Now there arose <S%H6965><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> over Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> who didn't <S%H3045><s%> know Joseph. <S%H3130><s%>
He said <S%H559><s%> to his people, <S%H5971><s%> "Behold, <S%H5971><s%> the people of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> are more <S%H7227><s%> and mightier than we. <S%H6099><s%>

Come, <S%H3051><s%> let us deal wisely <S%H2449><s%> with them, <S%H7235><s%> lest they multiply, and it happen that when any war <S%H4421><s%> breaks out, <S%H7122><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> also join <S%H3254><s%> themselves to our enemies, <S%H8130><s%> and fight <S%H3898><s%> against us, <S%H5927><s%> and escape out of the land. <S%H776><s%>"

Therefore they set <S%H7760><s%> taskmasters <S%H4522><s%> over them to afflict <S%H6031><s%> them with their burdens. <S%H5450><s%> They built <S%H1129><s%> storage <S%H4543><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> for Pharaoh: <S%H6547><s%> Pithom <S%H6619><s%> and Raamses. <S%H7486><s%>

But the more they afflicted <S%H6031><s%> them, <S%H3651><s%> the more they multiplied <S%H7235><s%> and the more they spread out. <S%H6555><s%> They were grieved <S%H6973><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
The Egyptians <S%H4714><s%> ruthlessly <S%H6531><s%> made <S%H5647><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> serve, <S%H5647><s%>

and they made <S%H4843><s%> their lives <S%H2416><s%> bitter <S%H4843><s%> with hard <S%H7186><s%> service, <S%H5656><s%> in mortar <S%H2563><s%> and in brick, <S%H3843><s%> and in all kinds of service <S%H5656><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> all their service, <S%H5656><s%> in which they ruthlessly <S%H6531><s%> made them serve. <S%H5647><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> midwives, <S%H3205><s%> of whom the name <S%H8034><s%> of the one <S%H259><s%> was Shiphrah, <S%H8236><s%> and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the other <S%H8145><s%> Puah, <S%H6326><s%>

and he said, <S%H559><s%> "When you perform the duty of a midwife <S%H3205><s%> to the Hebrew women, <S%H5680><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> them on the birth stool; <S%H70><s%> if it is a son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall kill <S%H4191><s%> him; <S%H1323><s%> but if it is a daughter, then she shall live. <S%H2425><s%>"

But the midwives <S%H3205><s%> feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> and didn't <S%H6213><s%> do what the king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%> them, <S%H2421><s%> but saved the baby boys <S%H3206><s%> alive. <S%H2421><s%>

The king <S%H4428><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> for the midwives, <S%H3205><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to them, <S%H4069><s%> "Why have you done <S%H6213><s%> this thing, <S%H1697><s%> and have saved <S%H2421><s%> the boys <S%H3206><s%> alive? <S%H2421><s%>"

The midwives <S%H3205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> "Because the Hebrew <S%H5680><s%> women <S%H802><s%> aren't <S%H4713><s%> like the Egyptian women; for they are vigorous, <S%H2422><s%> and give birth <S%H3205><s%> before <S%H2962><s%> the midwife <S%H3205><s%> comes to them. <S%H935><s%>"
God <S%H430><s%> dealt well <S%H3190><s%> with the midwives, <S%H3205><s%> and the people <S%H5971><s%> multiplied, <S%H7235><s%> and grew very <S%H3966><s%> mighty. <S%H6105><s%>
It happened, <S%H3205><s%> because the midwives feared <S%H3372><s%> God, <S%H430><s%> that he gave <S%H6213><s%> them families. <S%H1004><s%>

Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> all his people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You shall cast <S%H7993><s%> every son <S%H1121><s%> who is born <S%H3209><s%> into the river, <S%H2975><s%> and every daughter <S%H1323><s%> you shall save alive. <S%H2421><s%>"
